gen:link.msg:message: `ProfitSharingAndDiscounts` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProfitSharingAndDiscountsBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ProfitSharingAndDiscounts')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProfitSharingAndDiscountsBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ProfitSharingAndDiscounts return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProfitSharingAndDiscountsBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfProfitSharingAndDiscountsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProfitSharingAndDiscountsBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfProfitSharingAndDiscountsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProfitSharingAndDiscountsBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfProfitSharingAndDiscountsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProfitSharingAndDiscountsBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfProfitSharingAndDiscountsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
